hint.metricDescription: The distribution of special code features relative to the code plays a role in the readability of code. This means that features should be periodically distributed evenly rather than only occurring at a certain point or wildly distributed in the code. In this case, the aim is to distribute the use of keywords as evenly as possible in the code, as this is generally more readable than using many keywords in some places, few in some places and no keywords at all in other places
hint.goodCodeDescription: In his example the use of keywords is evenly distributed
hint.badCodeDescription: In this example the use of keywords not evenly distributed
